DOC.brief_title: Door To Unloading With IMPELLA CP System Acute Myocardial Infarction
DOC.detailed_description: A multi-center , prospective , randomize , two-arm feasibility trial assess potential role unload Impella CP prior revascularization reduce infarct size . The study design include 1:1 randomization : 1 ) Delay Arm : 30 minute unload Impella CP prior primary percutaneous coronary intervention ( PPCI ) ; 2 ) Immediate Arm : initiation Impella CP unload follow immediately PPCI .
